tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional care I received during my artificial teeth_ Complete dentures after removing  8 nos of tooth  by Dr Revathi Kartikeyan . 
From the moment I walked into your clinic, I felt welcomed and at ease.

Warm and Friendly Atmosphere generated by both dr revathi and the the receptionists 

Painless Treatment: As someone who usually dreads dental procedures, I was pleasantly surprised by how painless everything was.  Dr is not in hurry to pluck all at once conisdering my age and painfulness .. 

Thorough Examination: Thank you for taking the time to perform a thorough examination. Your attention to detail and commitment to my oral health did not go unnoticed.

Effective Communication: Dr Revathi patiently answered all my questions and addressed any concerns I had. Your communication style is both informative and reassuring.

Wishing you continued success in providing outstanding dental care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had a wisdom tooth extraction performed by Dr. Revathi, and I am extremely pleased with the entire experience. From the initial consultation to the post-operative care, Dr. Revathi and the staff were professional, compassionate, and highly skilled.

Dr. Revathi explained the procedure thoroughly, addressing all my concerns and ensuring I felt comfortable and informed every step of the way. The extraction itself was remarkably smooth and nearly pain-free, a testament to Dr. Revathi's expertise and gentle approach.

The aftercare instructions were clear and helpful, contributing to a swift and comfortable recovery. I greatly appreciate the follow-up call to check on my well-being, which reinforced the level of care and attention provided.

I highly recommend Dr. Revathi to anyone needing dental care, especially for complex procedures like wisdom tooth extractions. Thank you, Dr. Revathi, for your outstanding service and dedication to patient care.

---
Ashok Kumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,
review: Dr Revathi is excellent in all dental practices and specialises in Crowns & Bridge procedures. Since then, I have broken a couple of my lower front teeth at age 16 and have tried to manage through dentures.  Procrastinate to address this permanently due to ignorance and resistance to explore the right doctor/clinic. Since there is a plan to move abroad in the coming weeks, I have decided to fix the missing teeth during my visit to Chennai. I have checked the procedures and costs in a couple of dental clinics, including one of the very famous chains in Chennai. The procedure proposals, timeliness including fees are not convincing. I heard about Dr Revathi through my brother's reference and visited her clinic in Kattupakkam. The 1st-day procedure of grinding the adjacent teeth is to introduce Zirconia Crowns & Bridges as a replacement and measurement, the stage 1 root canal to avoid the sensitivity at a later stage.  She & her assistant stayed very late (till 10:45 PM) to complete this procedure. The next day she has given the temporary teeth after completion of the root canal.  she also very accurately picked the teeth' colour shades ( Dual shades - A3.5, A2) under natural light for permanent teeth. We have decided to go with 3M Lava Zirconia Premium Crowns from DentCare Lab.  Next, I went to the Vipassana Meditation program for ten days without any contact. She is very kind for an appointment @ 2 pm on Sunday to fix the permanent teeth since we left for Delhi the following day. The return from the Vipassana program got delayed by 1 Hr & she patiently waited till 3 pm to start the procedure, which went well the first time, right without even a minor hiccup, including the shades. Now, my missing teeth look original, and it has added tremendous confident while talking and smiling. Dr Revathi also explained the different dental procedures available during our interaction, giving us enough wisdom about dental practices. I have started recommending Dr Revathi to our nears and dears to bring back smile on their face.

review: For the discomfort and swelling in my teeth i went to meet Dr.Revathi.Through an X-ray she discovered there was an  Property teeth and which is also misaligned.She provided a thorough explanation of the surgery choices. For the procedure we choose general anesthesia.Even though the procedure took 30 to 45 mins the trust in Doctor feel more secure.The procedure was painless and it went exactly as anticipated.After procedure she explained what need to be followed.I would like to thank Dr.revathi for the Timely treatment and help me in speedy recovery.
reply_text: we used local anesthesia sir..thank you sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Full Mouth Rehabilitation,
review: Dr Revathi is an amazing doctor with high skills and most professional.  The more to be praised about her is the empathy towards patient and kind words that makes one more comfortable with the treatment. I am amazed about her intricate care that she took for me and my husband as we both have other medical complications.  She keeps checking even after treatment and attend our untimely calls and messages as.well,  for any of our clarification and doubts.  I wholeheartedly wish her all the best that she reaches more heights and serve the society with the greatest skills she has got.  Thank you so much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited her clinic with severe tooth ache, post examination she confirmed that need to go for RCT for 2 tooth. I must say she is really good in handling patients, I was dead scared of this treatment and gave enough trouble while performing RCT but she ensured that I am in safe hands. In fist visit did RCT and measurement, second visit she fixed the cap. She was so friendly and explained how to take care of tooth post treatment. Thank you so much Doctor 🙏 I am feeling really comfortable with the placement of caps.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi every one, i would like to share my experience as i visited this doctor upon my friend's recommendation during my recent visit to India, and i am happy and satisfied with the doctor's way of approach with patients and  treatment of professionalism with friendliness and minimal waiting time.  Being a traveller the aspect of on time delivery of the required treatment and products with almost no time wastage is a strength point attributing towards this doctor.and highly recommended to those who are chasing time in thier daily schedules. Regarding the cost and expenses involved  for my dental treatment of molar implant combined with cosmetic / aesthetic treatment of filling my front teeth was much economical and with in my affordable budget. Can say, even much cheaper than few other medical facilities for the same required treatment.Finally i wish the doctor goodluck and sucess in her dental profession to keep going strong and help around those seeking patients .
Thank You

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
1st time visit doctor explained why do I need RCT after scanning and the possibile reason for the cavity

2nd time visit I have gone through RCT the way doctor approached is really neat and caring even during this Corona time

3rd time visit I gave measurement for my teeth and also doctor grained all my sharp teeth so that it won't hurt me in future

4th time visit doctor fixed the tooth and cleaned all my gums and teeth. And gave general advice on how to brush and what needs to be avoided.

In overall treatment really appreciable part is doctor caring during the treatment giving positive vibes and making more comfortable even if we get small pain doctor explaining the reason and continuing.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a teeth ache issue past five months, I was searching for a good dentist suddenly my friend refered a dentist revathi, I approached her and explained my infection in teeth and pain. She requested to visit clinic. 

Myself went her clinic and the atmosphere in clinic is good and the precautions for Corona been maintained at most care. 

She started the treatment with atmost care and protection with Corona safety norms etc. 

Regular check-up continued with instructions followed as advised by dentist. Finally the payment part is also not high it's a nominal fees taken by doctor. 

Such a nice and care support given by all the staff and doctor.

Myself happy to eat a lot now....

Balaji. 
Thirumullaivoyal. 
**********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was unable to find a  dentist in my area due to covid situation and was feeling severe tooth ache due to cavity. I found this doctor in Practo and booked an appointment with her. Doctor was very kind and patience, was able to explain things clearly after taking necessary check ups for covid. Place was very hygiene.We decided to perform an extraction of infected teeth. Doctor was caring enough to wait patiently and remove infected teeth with less pain as the anesthesia took time to take effect. I highly recommend to give a visit to this clinic for dental issues where you will leave with 100% satisification. Also I would like to extend my thanks as there are not many dental clinics open during this pandemic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** ** ******* ******** A small edge of my tooth got broken while eating and I went to this dentist to fix it with a dental filling paste/cement and the entire cement came out in 2 days so again I went to her to fix it and again it came out after a few days. Later, I went to a different dentist *** *** ***** ** *** ** ** **** *** *** *** *** **** **** **** ******* *** ****** ** *** ** ***** **** ***** ** ******
reply_text: It's unfortunate to notice your comment. From the beginning I insisted filling is a temporary solution and suggested you to go for crown. It was an informed decision from your end that you were going for a temporary solution. It's leaving us both in a bad taste at this point of time.

Above all she suggested the right toothpaste and brush and way of brushing, along with the direction to use mouth wash, with the dos and doubts of eating particular foods. Strongly recommend for everyone.

The way the treatment done was very nice and i would prefer this doctor for any teeth related stuffs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had an ache in my right side last tooth. I went to Dr. Revathi. She checked my tooth and found the ache was due to infection. She was very friendly, caring and explaining the reason of my problem in a simple manner. She recommended treatment on step by step basis and based on my situation. My problem completely solved after few days of complete cleaning of my tooth during my 2nd appointment. Very satisfying and I will definitely recommend her for my friends and colleagues. Thank you Mam.
